alert.note: Alert for Austin; Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Montgomery; Walker; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:49PM CDT until June 10 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL AUSTIN...BURLESON...SOUTHERN GRIMES...SOUTHEASTERN BRAZOS...WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHERN WALLER AND SOUTHWESTERN WALKER COUNTIES... At 1048 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Lake Conroe Dam to 7 miles southeast of Washington to near Dime Box, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Areas near and south of Caldwell and also near Washington could have up to 2 inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern College Station, Brenham, Navasota, Hempstead, Caldwell, Washington, Somerville, Montgomery, Snook, Burton, Millican, Anderson, Todd Mission, Lake Somerville Dam, Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway, Lyons, Deanville, Dobbin, Independence and Quarry. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Montgomery; Walker; Waller; Washington
